ygData.subject: Re: Names et al. Long but doing it in one post :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well thank you very much for making things EVER SO MUCH MORE COMPICATED!!! ahhahahah :)   lots of cool words there!!!! -joe =============================
ygData.messageBody:
Well thank you very much for making things EVER SO MUCH MORE COMPICATED!!!
ahhahahah :) lots of cool words there!!!!

-joe
=============================
Joseph J. Normandin
josephn@...
http://acs.bu.edu:8001/~josephn
=============================
----- Original Message -----
From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 5:59 PM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Names et al. Long but doing it in one post :)


> From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
>
>
> Anyway .. random points on previous suggestions:
> - "Order of the Chosen" is even on Brell, my Mage was involved but not key
> - I'd also like to believe the Norrath culture is gay positive, where
while
> a minority, subject to discrimination, after all *I* did grow up thinking
> it was all perfectly normal :)
> - If we don't vote or have some particapatory (sp?) method of choosing,
> some may feel slighted. Though of course the eventual one chosen can't
> possibly be everyones favorite.
> - I agree you should avoid handing the immature element an excuse to
> harrass on a platter. < Aside: I was subject to two on-line "rapes" in a
> previous MUD - interesting stories, and yes just some dumb kid and emotes,
> but it *does* ruin your evening no matter how much you realize its just
> some dumb kid. Two in six years of on-line RPing is a low rate .. but >
> - I don't know about some GBLT/other mytical connection angle. I don't
> feel any "mystical connection" to the GBLTs in my life, to me they're just
> family. :P But perhaps if its explained in the RP as suggested?
>
> And my own general suggestions:
> - After being subjected to the sense of humor in this group in the guild
> chat, perhaps a name with some humor? The group seemed very good at that!
> <my stomach still hurts!>
> - Perhaps we should add to the charter that you are expected to have fun?
> - As far as a diety Rp angle. The women seem to have something going with
> Erollisi already <ducks from Christina>, if you read about the dieties
> Quellious seems to be the one most in-line with respect of differences.
So
> for an RP angle, something Quellious oriented maybe?
> - If we assume Norrath accepts all sexual orientations as normal facets of
> life, then *if* you grew up in this world (Norrath), what would a group of
> GBLTs (and friends!) call themselves? What can we think of here? The
> message I seem to hear is "We all belong here and together".
>
> And I was the one with the thesaurus :) So, going on the humor/joy/gay
> angle which I was asked to last night and trying to choose the simple
> English words with a medieval sound to them ... Also looked up "group"
> type words .. no luck on synergy.
>
> Group Words: Society, Fellowship, Circle, Ring, Alliance, Voices, Spirits,
> Conclave, Band
> Medieval "Gay" Words: Mirth, Cheer, Felicity, Gambol, Merry
> Other descriptive words suggested: Mystic, Harmony, United (if not unity)
> Force/Soldiers: Force, Champion, Swashbuckler, Guards, Troop, Volunteers,
> Legion, Brigade, Corps, Company, Rabble, Horde, Tribe
>
> Playing mix and match (and trying no to sound too "nice" for the RPers):
> The Merry Horde
> Legion of Mirth
> (well at least descriptive of the rabble in the chat room)
>
> - Lora, creating more fodder
>
>
>
>
